issue.title: [CF 254] Unit Cooldown Sort By Ascending and Cooldown Icon
issue.body:
Unit Cooldown Set two spells like below
Spell 1: 8; Spell 2: 30
Checked show when Unusable
If Sort By Ascending, at first cast spell 1 and spell 2, two spell cooldown start, when spell 1 cooldown finished, cast spell 1 again, icon still show cooldown of spell 2.
Export String:

``` ^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SSort^N-1 ^SType^Sunitcooldown ^SShowWhen^Sunalpha ^SName^S20271:8;~`20925:30 ^SEnabled^B ^t^N44312^^ ```

By the way
Icon type of Cooldown set more than one spell and checked unusable, must all spells is unusable to show the icon, not one spell unusable.
Export String:

``` ^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Scooldown ^SShowWhen^Sunalpha ^SName^S82327;~`20271 ^SEnabled^B ^t^N44312^^ ```

Sorry for my bad english. :)


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl | Imported from CurseForge issue #254 | Raw

comments.body:
You just figured out a huge mistake in the code. I was using the time since the last cast of a spell instead of the time until the cooldown ends to determine the shortest duration. Derp.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
